effects.display_string: Set: Using Eviscerate, Rupture, or Black Powder has a chance to summon a shadow clone to echo your finishing move for 70% additional Shadow damage.
Set: Your shadow clones deal 20% increased damage with all attacks and grant you 2 combo points per clone when summoned.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

spells.description: Equip: Greatly improves the comfort of your gear, allowing you to enter a Zone of Focus while over 90% health, granting you 1,193 Mastery.

spells.description: Equip: Greatly improves the comfort of your gear, allowing you to enter a Zone of Focus while over 90% health, granting you 1,193 Mastery.
Equip: Dealing Fire damage has a chance to ignite your enemies, burning them for an additional 27,069 damage every 2 seconds.
Equip: Your harmful debuffs, and periodic spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 7,582 Agility and suffer 125,860 Shadow damage over 12 sec.

playable_classes.display_string: Classes: Druid, Death Knight, Priest, Rogue

spells.description:
Use: Draw power from the remnants of the Embersoul, gaining 10,531 Agility for 20 sec, decaying every 2 sec. Once this effect ends, become Burned Out, losing 879 Haste for 60 sec before recovering.

When circumstances are dire your soul ignites, granting this bonus again without decaying. This effect may only occur once per combat. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Carve out a piece of your target's dreams, consuming it to gain a benefit based on the creature's type. (1 Min Cooldown)
